title: In the politest possible way:
body:
Please stop releasing special chromas and or borders for **every single f*cking skin** that comes out.

Its nice, for like a special event like VS, or maybe as a special selling point for the PROJECT: skins, or maybe even as a bonus for legendary skins. But when you have to pay for a $40 bundle every time a normal uneventful skin comes out for one of your champs, it gets real old real fast.

3 or 4 times a year maybe do some special things with special chromas and borders, but when multiple skins per patch, multiple patches in a row, come out with 'limited edition' crap, not only does it make people give up on the whole collecting thing, but it makes the 'limited edition' title feel token and worthless as well.

Like seriously, give it a break!

replies.body: Unless it's an Eve skin... in which case they put no effort into it and don't bother making any chromas.

Kids love their extra bells and whistles, so Riot make a packet.

As for myself, I'm only interested in skilled gameplay, not really a skins person.
